snippet: Andy Murray's route to securing the year-end world number ranking looks fraught with danger after the top seed was grouped with Stan Wawrinka, Kei Nishikori and Marin Cilic for next week's ATP World Tour Finals in London....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray's route to securing the year-end world number ranking looks fraught with danger after the top seed was grouped with Stan Wawrinka, Kei Nishikori and Marin Cilic for next week's ATP World Tour Finals in London.

headline.print_headline: Murray Handed Tough Draw in Bid to End Year Number One
headline.main: Murray Handed Tough Draw in Bid to End Year Number One
